main.name: Kritika Verma
main.description: B. Tech. Graduate | Strong foundation in designing, implementing, integrating and launching projects | Sound knowledge of Database and Programming languages
main.bio: Good logical and interpersonal skills. Having a background in Computer Science With an experience of 1+ years in the IT industry. Working experience in different technical languages and tools. Having fundamental knowledge in Data Structure, Algorithms, OOPS, DBMS, and Operating Systems.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Developed project concepts and maintained optimal workflow. Responsible for software maintenance across the codebase. Cooperated with team to create clean interfaces. Worked with seniors to manage large, complex design projects for corporate clients. Worked on various tools like Postman, SQL Server. Promoted from Intern to full time Software Engineer within 3 months.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
